itemDescription: British soldier who fought throughout World War II armed with a longbow, arrows, and a Scottish broadsword

wikipedia_page.main: John Malcolm Thorpe Fleming Churchill,  (16 September 1906 – 8 March 1996) was a British Army officer who fought in the Second World War with a longbow, bagpipes, and a Scottish broadsword. Nicknamed "Fighting Jack Churchill" and "Mad Jack", he was known for the motto: "Any officer who goes into action without his sword is improperly dressed."
